meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Tim Courchaine Scott Mitchell Kristin Morgan Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6521.

td.p: Tim Courchaine, a fund administration manager from Everett, Massachusetts
Scott Mitchell, a technical project manager from New York, New York
Kristin Morgan, a strategic analyst for NASA from Huntsville, Alabama (whose 3-day cash winnings total $17,498)

tr.td: MUDDY WATERS
DR. JOHN
BUDDY, GUY
B.C. KING
SINGING THE BLUES
MY WOMAN IS GONE & MY WHISKEY RAN DRY

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'In Brazil, the sandy water of the Solimoes River flows side-by-side with the Rio Negro until they merge into this huge river')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: In Brazil, the sandy water of the Solimoes River flows side-by-side with the Rio Negro until they merge into this huge river
